## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5a7fe67cbf547a37aaa2286e629788d404dbcc306a63bd6edbd4101513e27138)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'sdp-transform-writer' @ 99.99.100 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
